name: Horatama
description:
Thank you for purchasing Horatama virtual pets, valued customer! Please make sure to take good care of their needs to ensure your safety.

Care for a variety of lovable and terrifying digital pets, each of which may escape its console and tear a hole in reality - and you - if it gets too unhappy! You’ll have to manage an ever-increasing amount of pets that demand your attention in different ways.

Can you survive taking care of your child’s Horatama while they’re at a sleepover, or will they “take care” of you?
